description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: １. 數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２. 插值及多項式３. 數值積分與微４. 數值線性代數５. 非線性方程式之解６. 曲線配合與函數近似７. 近似解理論８. 常微分方程式的數值解法９. 偏微分方程式的數值解法
description.en: 1.Preliminary of Numerical Solutions2.Interpolations and Polynomials3.Numerical Differentiation and Integratin 4.Numerical Linear Algebra5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems6.Curve Fitting and cubic spline Interpolation 7.Approximation Theory8.Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations9.Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL 系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10. 數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC 所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13. 使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14. 採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC 之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16. 微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

notes: 電子三四甲乙丙合開，綜科 501

description.zh: 介紹智慧聯網及新世代網路在固定綜合網路、行動通信網路、網際網路及有線電視網路之現況與未來發展
description.en: To introduce internet of things and the system of next generation network over fixed 、mobile 、internet and cable network。

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到 17 世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

notes: 108 (含) 前：歷史核心；109：人文與藝術

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解施工安全衛生的重要，熟悉有關知識及緊急措施，從而增加處變之因應能力。內容包括施工安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，風險評估與安全管理，施工安全和衛生設備，安全經費編列與執行，新穎的風險評估及安全管理方法與研究等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the students the concept of the importance of construction safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of construction safety, analysis of accidents, risk assessment and safety management, construction safety and facilities, safety outlay and implementation, current research and novel techniques for risk assessment and safety management and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 介紹國內外 "都市防災基本計畫" 之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 在網路上的視訊傳輸量佔據了超過一半的總頻寬 (原因來自於大量的移動用戶需求以及相關網路服務，如 Youtube)。因此將視訊壓縮到低位元率並保持良好的視訊品質便成了非常重要的一個課題。在課程的最後學生會了解視訊壓縮的概念及實作，並且有機會改進標準的視訊壓縮器。��	Image format, Image quality��	Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT)��	Scalar quantization and vector quantization��	JPEG: DCT, zonal coding, threshold coding��	JPEG: Zigzag, huffman coding in JPEG��	MPEG��	H.264, H.265, H.266��	Multi-View Coding (MVC)
description.en: The video transmission over the network has occupied more than half of the bandwidth of the internet (by Youtube and services mobile devices for example). Therefore it is essential to compress the video to save the bandwidth and maintain good video quality. Students will understand the concept of video compression and implement to improve the video coder. ��	Image format, Image quality��	Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT)��	Scalar quantization and vector quantization��	JPEG: DCT, zonal coding, threshold coding��	JPEG: Zigzag, huffman coding in JPEG��	MPEG��	H.264, H.265, H.266��	Multi-View Coding (MVC)

name.zh: 影像視訊壓縮理論與實作
name.en: Theory and implementation of image and video compression

notes: 電子三四甲乙丙合開，綜科 104

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 課程與教學

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 影像簡介， 2. 顏色空間， 3. 類比影像介面， 4. 數位影像介面， 5. 數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9. 數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: １. 組合分析２. 機率理論３. 隨機變數４. 隨機變數函數５. 機率分佈６. 期望值性質７. 樣本分佈８. 假設檢定９. 線性迴歸分析１０. 變異數分析
description.en: 1.Combinatonal Analysis2.Pribability Theory3.Random Variables4.Functions of Random variables5.Probability Distribution 6.Properties of Expectation  7.Sampling Distribution 8.Tests of Hypotheses9.Linear Regression Analysis10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage powerdistribution systems.

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 本課程介紹商用程式語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令的撰寫、程式的編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式的執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of data processing programming language, including basic input and output, program flow control, function application and other instruction writing, program editing, compilation, communication, and program execution and development.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 資財二甲乙合開 / 科研 240

description.zh: 資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹，基礎密碼學介紹，電腦病毒與惡意程式，網路安全與攻擊，網路安全防護，應用層安全，網頁安全，雲端安全，物聯網安全，個人資料保護
description.en: Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

description.zh: 藉由人工智慧的教學，使得學生有全面性的大局觀，及瞭解人工智慧是如何運作的，以及它的能力、侷限及未來發展，當投入各行業欲以人工智慧進行升級時，及協助企業能以人工智慧解決問題，有清楚的方向感來帶領企業前進。1. 瞭解人工智慧？？基礎 2. 瞭解人工智慧應用的方向 3. 可以熟？工具的操作，結合？？與實務
description.en: Through the teaching of artificial intelligence, students have a comprehensive view of the overall situation, and understand how artificial intelligence works, as well as its capabilities, limitations and future development. When investing in various industries to upgrade with artificial intelligence, and assisting enterprises to solve problems with artificial intelligence, the purpose of the course is to have a clear sense of direction to lead the enterprise forward.1. Understand the basics of artificial intelligence2. Understand the direction of artificial intelligence applications3. Can be familiar with the operation of the tool, combined with theory and practice.

description.zh: 當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
description.en: Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.

notes: 工管三甲乙 15 丙 20 合開 35 人

description.zh: 課程會涵蓋資訊能力與財金的整合來協助學生了解 FINTEC 服務。接下來透過設計思考來帶領學生透過設計一服務創新主題，讓學生以學習到的方法工具，進行實地演練，透過發表與評價，體驗完整的創新旅程，同時建立分組的創新作品集。
description.en: The course develops practical approaches for understanding and analyzing the servie of financial technologies (FinTech). The course will use design thinking to take students through the design of the User Experience (UX) and User-Interface (UI) of a product or service of their creation.

name.zh: 金融科技與服務創新流程

notes: 資財三、四甲乙和資財所合開

description.zh: 以深入淺出的方式，說明區塊鏈的技術及衍生的新商業模式，再進入以太坊區塊鏈的核心 - 智能合約，使學生能掌握 Solidity 程式語言，培養開發智能合約的能力，也能搭配 web3j、Ganache 等程式及工具，架設開發、測試的環境，並部署智能合約。更結合前端網頁及實務應用，創新創意或解決產業痛點，開發 DApp 實現解決方案。
description.en: Explain that the technology of the blockchain and the new business model derived, and then enter the core of the Ethereum blockchain-smart contracts.Let students master the Solidity programming language, cultivate the ability to develop smart contracts, and use web3j, Ganache and other tools to set up a development and testing environment, and deploy smart contracts.Combining front-end web pages and practical applications, innovative design or solving industrial problems, and developing DApp implementation solutions.

notes: 資財三、四甲乙合開 / 科研 243

description.zh: 金融科技是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到法律方面。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技與專利、商標、著作權、營業秘密及之間的關係、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要金融科技公司發展做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech is an emerging field. It will apply to many commercial fields. FinTech is not only in financial field, but also in legal field. This course will discuss the relationship between Finance, patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret and fair trading act. It also includes FinTech application and business model of famous FinTech companies. Case study is important in this course.

name.zh: 金融科技智慧財產權的管理與應用
name.en: Application of FinTech and Intellectual Property

description.zh: 智慧製造意旨透過資通訊及數位技術（例如數位控制、智慧機器人、自動光學檢測、雲端運算、人工智慧與物聯網等）的輔助，讓生產系統更具智慧，減少生產成本、提升產品品質與增加客戶滿意。本課程透過問題導向學習 (PBL) 方法，引導學生學習關於智慧製造之核心技術。
description.en: English description：The objective of smart manufacturing is to reduce manufacturing cost using information and communication technology, including digital control, industrial Robotics, automated inspection, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and internet of thing (IOT). This course provides introduction of smart manufacturing and hands on practice about collaborative robot (Cobot) and manufacturing execution system (MES) operation under the framework of problem-based learning (PBL) model.

name.zh: 智慧製造 PBL 專題
name.en: Problem Based Learning, special topics in Smart Manufacturing

notes: 學 25 碩 10 合開 35 人

description.zh: 統計數據分析是一種利用數據對遇到問題進行適當推測的藝術 (有時是最好)，本課程是一門以微積分為基礎的統計學分析的入門課程，旨在幫助學生學習描述性和推論性的統計程序，以及在不同領域中使用有用的數據分析。在回顧描述性統計和一些必要的概率分佈後，我們將討論區間估計、點估計、假說檢定方差分析、線性回歸分析、因子設計、聚類分析的基本概念、分類和支持向量機，並伴隨著實踐和理論練習。因此這些技能將為學生提供一個基礎，培養學生獨自進行分析和有效評估他人統計分析結果的能力。
description.en: ‘Statistical data analytics’ is the art of using data to make appropriate (sometimes, best!) conjectures about problems encountered. This course is a calculus-based introduction to statistics and data analytics, and so designed to help students learn the introductory descriptive and inferential statistical procedures, and useful data analytics that are used in diverse areas. After a review of descriptive statistics and some necessary probability distributions, we will discuss interval and point estimation, hypothesis tests, ANOVA, linear regression analysis, factorial designs, and basic concept of cluster analysis, classification, and support vector machines accompanying practical and theoretical exercises. Consequently, these skills will provide the student with a basis to conduct their own such analyzes and to evaluate critically others’ uses of statistical analysis results.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討企業面對數位轉型衝擊下，其商業模式勢必要有所調整。其中商業模式在數位化下如何規劃與運作，以及其中如何將數據運用與融入營運機制是其重要課題。因此，課程中除了基本數位商業模式與數據驅動營運之基礎概念與其對應之理論講授外之外，為增進學生對其實務應用了解，相關之產業個案亦作探討。
description.en: This course aims to explore the need for adjustments in the business model of enterprises facing the impact of digital transformation. Among them, how to plan and operate the business model under digitalization, and how to use and integrate data into the operating mechanism is an important topic. Therefore, in addition to basic digital business models and basic concepts of tree-residential-driven operations and their corresponding theoretical lectures, the course also explores industrial cases in order to enhance students’ understanding of practical applications.

name.zh: 數據驅動營運與創新商模專題研究
name.en: Research on data-driven operation and innovative business models

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家 — 喬瑟及莎士比亞 — 作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to some of the stories that have been most influential in the English-speaking world. Knowing these stories provides essential background knowledge for understanding Western culture in general.

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的進階基礎課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由先進智慧鐵道系統的介紹，使修課學生能夠清楚瞭解鐵道產業的未來發展方向，並引領學生積極投入各種先進智慧鐵道應用系統之研究。本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請智慧鐵道系統相關、學有專精的技術研發人員、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時進行實作系統的展示，並邀請鐵道產業專家擔任評審。修習本課程前，不同學系之學生須先修習的課程清單另訂定之。
description.en: This course is one of the advanced core courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The aim of this course is, via the introduction of advanced intelligent rail system, to have the students realize thoroughly the development trend of futuristic rail industry, and subsequently, to encourage the students into the research and development of various application systems for intelligent railway. This course is a joint lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors to our participant students include R&D experts from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In their term reports, the students will have to demonstrate the prototypes of their projects and to be reviewed by the invited senior professionals from rail industry. The prerequisites for taking this course will be determined based on the background of students with different majors.

notes: 日間部機械四 / 進修部產學訓四年級合開 / 各部限 25 人

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，遠距的商機迅速崛起。在後疫情時代，人們的行為模式改變了，接受訊息的渠道幾乎都轉移到網路上，而商業行為自然也必須更新行銷手段，於是數位行銷（ Digital Marketing ）應勢而生。電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。數位化的網路電子商務已經成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。
description.en: After the Cov-19, digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 蕭名宏 (兼任)/ 限 40 人

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一 自 109 級起必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二 自 109 級起必修 台北上課

description.zh: 現代人工作壓力大，許多上班族都有壓力、失眠、焦慮等問題。醫學也發現，身體許多疾病甚至癌症也都和情緒、壓力有關。目前，已經證實正念減壓：可以降低壓力與焦慮，疲勞，降低員工的職業倦怠程度和離職率。提升睡眠品質，增強孼疫系統，提升專注力，提高領導效能，提升大腦功能與創造力，促進幸福感。滿意度，情緒管理能力、創造力、與人際溝通能力，提高工作績效。改善了個人健康、工作與家庭生活！因此，目前歐美和國內的各大企業紛紛引入正念課程，以提高員工和企業績效。
description.en: There are so many people with the high stress in the workplace. It’s demonstrated that practicing mindfulness can bring improvements in both physical and psychological symptoms as well as positive changes in health, attitudes, and behaviors. The advantages of integrating mindfulness in the workplace including:higher brain functioning;reduced work-related stress, anxiety, depression, fatigue, and psychological distress .Improves job performance, greater job satisfaction, and decreasing turnover and burnout.

name.en: Mindfulness for Leadership and Stress Reduction

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理 / 陳德中、張振興

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理 & 經營策略實務

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 就生產與服務系統做模擬分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。
description.en: Use simulation modeling for the resolution of complex system design, system improvement and management decision.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 本課程旨在探究投資者如何安排與管理各類金融資產，透過本課程期使學生瞭解投資基本理論、投資工具與運用、投資分析與策略、金融證券市場實務操作以及投資未來的新趨勢，給予學生正確的投資觀念。課程內容包括投資學背景架構、報酬與投資組合理論等等。站在投資者的角度，結合投資理論與學術實證結果之討論，將投資的基本理論與觀念，讓學生理解在市場與投資決策上之實用性，並培養獨立思考與辯證能力。
description.en: This course is to interpret the economic analysis and evaluation of investment. The main topics include investment models, investment criteria, investment risk analysis, investment decision under uncertainty.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 先修課程：4402012 或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括：最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的 loop shaping 及 loop transfer recovery 技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統 (可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402025 或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹勞資關係各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種勞動法規應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解勞動法規的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the Industrial Relations each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of Labor Laws, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial Relations main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹人工智慧與最佳化的概念、人工智慧與最佳化問題的解法、以及人工智慧最佳化技術在製造業與服務業的應用。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts of artificial intelligence and  optimization, the solution algorithms for the artificial intelligence and  optimization problems, and its applications on manufacturing and services industries.

notes: 資財三、四甲乙和資財所合開 / 科研 243
